items.title: For Writers
items.description: Intuitive CMS features with a visual editor that makes content creation effortless. Write in Markdown or use the rich-text editor.

items.title: For Developers
items.description: Git-based workflow with Markdown, React components, and OpenAPI integration. Build exactly what you need.

items.title: For Users
items.description: Fast, responsive documentation websites with excellent search and navigation. Beautiful on any device.
